name: wario goes to the ocean
description:
wario water bill is down, so now its up to wario to find a good water in the ocean.

also credits are at the end. (and this game has no virus , hope anyone knows that because a admin from mfgg said i posted a virus but i bet its his virus checker being dumb).

ok tbh this game is mostly short because i rushed this game for reasons. but yeah you know the story already, try to enjoy the game i guess...? 

Also credit for evan.F for nothing and mawboi for being my babe.

VideogameKid gets a shoutout cause hes the werio guy.

now can i leave? I want to see my kids
